thread.section_title: Hostelworld.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hostelworld.com | www.hostelworld.com
thread.title: Becca

author: Becca
title: Becca
text: We booked three nights in a hostel through hostelworld yesterday, and today found out they overcharge by over 80 euros! This is unacceptable. Also, when we were booking we thought we may need to cancel due to potential date changes, and we read that "Cancellations and changes of your booking are free of charge up to 48 hours prior to arrival" which led us to believe cancellation was possible. We tried to cancel after finding how much we'd overpaid, but were told then that our deposit was non-refundable. Rip off, do not book with hostel world!
